English:
Cannot attack targets other than &target. 
Removed upon attacking the target.
Chinese:
无法攻击除&target以外的目标。
攻击目标时解除。

English: After attacking a single enemy (non-Follow-up attack), if the target has [Black Mark], &allname performs a Follow-up attack. Deals &alldam damage per stack of [Black Mark] on the target.
Chinese: 攻击单个敌人后(非追加攻击)，若目标带有【黑色印记】&allname对目标进行追加攻击，目标每有1层【黑色印记】，造成&alldam点伤害。

English: The next &a skills used by this character will be cast twice.
Chinese: 自身接下来使用的&a个技能将重复释放1次。

English:
Increases skill costs in hand by 1 and grants Critical to attack skills. 
Restores 1 Mana after using skills from hand. 
Increases Critical damage by 50% of the sum of excess Hit Rate and Critical Rate when attacking enemies.
Chinese:
手中自身的技能费用增加1点且攻击技能获得致命，使用手中的技能后恢复1点法力值。
攻击敌人时根据溢出的命中率与暴击率之和的50%增加暴击伤害。

English: Hit Rate and Evasion Rate Reduced
This debuff's effectiveness increases by 5% per stack of [Black Mark].
Chinese: 每有1层【黑色印记】，此减益的数值提升5%。

English: Restores 1 Mana after using non-Exclude skills.
Chinese: 使用自己的非放逐技能后恢复1点法力值。

English:
Increases [Black Mark]'s max stacks to 5 and duration to 3 turns. 
Stacks that have already triggered damage can trigger again at 50% reduced damage.
Chinese:
【黑色印记】的层数上限提升至5，持续时间提升至3回合。
【黑色印记】已触发过伤害的层数可再次触发，但伤害减少50%。

English:
Duration scales with player turns. 
Takes &a damage when [White Mark] is applied. 
Triggered stacks cannot reactivate.
Chinese:
持续时间基于玩家回合。
被施加【白色印记】时，受到&a点伤害。
已触发过的层数不会再次被触发。

English:
Duration scales with player turns. 
Takes &a damage when [White Mark] is applied. 
Triggered stacks cannot reactivate.
Chinese:
持续时间基于玩家回合。
被施加【白色印记】时，受到&a点伤害。
已触发过的层数不会再次被触发。

English: Adds damage equal to received damage to the next attack.
Chinese: 受到伤害后，将等量伤害附加至自身的下一次攻击。

English: When Shield depletes, converts stat bonuses to "30% Evasion Rate Increase".
Chinese: 保护罩耗尽时，属性增益转化为“闪避率增加30%”。

English: Reduces Defense equal to current Defense.
Chinese: 降低等于当前防御力的防御力

English:
When targeted by enemies, applies 1 stack of [White Mark] and counterattacks before their action, dealing &a damage. 
Deals &b additional damage per stack of [White Mark] on the target.
Chinese:
被敌人瞄准时，在敌人行动前对其施加1层【白色印记】并进行反击，造成&a点伤害。
其每带有1层【白色印记】，额外造成&b点伤害。

English:
Increases [White Mark]'s max stacks to 5 and duration to 3 turns. 
Stacks that have already triggered damage can trigger again at 50% reduced damage.
Chinese:
【白色印记】的层数上限提升至5，持续时间提升至3回合。
【白色印记】已触发过伤害的层数可再次触发，但伤害减少50%。

English:
Duration scales with player turns. 
Takes &a damage when [Black Mark] is applied. 
Triggered stacks cannot reactivate.
Chinese:
持续时间基于玩家回合。
被施加【黑色印记】时，受到&a点伤害。
已触发过的层数不会再次被触发。

English:
Duration scales with player turns. 
Takes &a damage when [Black Mark] is applied. 
Triggered stacks cannot reactivate.
Chinese:
持续时间基于玩家回合。
被施加【黑色印记】时，受到&a点伤害。
已触发过的层数不会再次被触发。

English: If you need to distinguish me from the other "Nytos", call me Adeline. This is the name I gave myself.
Chinese: “涅托”，如果你要做一个区分，就叫我艾德琳吧，这是我给自己起的名字。

English:
Adeline's non-Follow-up attacks grant targets 1 stack of [Black Mark]. 
When attacking units with [Black Mark], each stack increases Critical Rate by 15% and Critical Damage by 10%.

At Lv3, gain [Targeted Analysis Contract] to replace one exclusive skill.
At Lv5, gain a 2nd [Targeted Analysis Contract] and equipment [Black Nightmare].
Chinese:
艾德琳的非追加攻击命中时给予目标1层【黑色印记】。
艾德琳攻击带有【黑色印记】的单位时，每层【黑色印记】增加15%暴击率与10%暴击伤害。

3级时获得道具【定向解析契约】，使用后可替换1个专属技能。
5级时获得第2张【定向解析契约】与装备【漆黑梦魇】。

English:
A Paradeus "Nyto" unit specializing in high-damage rifles. Dances through explosions to devastate enemies with relentless assaults. As a mass-produced model, her emotional suppression leaves her humanity ambiguous.

If only Adeline or Alina is in the party, the other will prioritize appearing during camp recruitment.
Chinese:
帕拉蒂斯“涅托”里的一员，使用高杀伤力的步枪型武器作战，在爆炸中起舞，用怒涛般的攻势重创敌阵。作为量产机习惯压抑自己的情绪，阴冷难明的外壳下是否有属于人类的情感，也不得而知。

队伍中有且仅有艾德琳与埃莉诺其中之一时，另一方将优先在营地招募时出现。

English: T_adl_3_1: Run now. It's not time to die yet.
T_adl_6_1: Shall I show you fireworks?
T_adl_5_1: The dead rest eternally; the living march onward.
T_adl_5_2: All souls return to the divine realm—if they had faith.
Chinese: T_adl_5_2:所有的亡者都会回归神国，不过前提是有信仰的对象。

English: T_adl_2_1: If I die here... will I wake again?
Chinese: T_adl_2_1:这次死去的话，我还能醒来吗？
T_adl_9_1:居然有不剖开身体就能完成的强化···

English: T_adl_8_1: I don't use maps. Which direction?
Chinese: T_adl_8_1:我不会用地图，往哪个方向走？

English: T_adl_11_1: Overwriting core commands. Loyalty target redirected...
Chinese: T_adl_11_1:底层命令改写，效忠目标重定向···

English: T_adl_11_2: Overwriting core commands. Loyalty target redirected...
Chinese: T_adl_11_2:底层命令改写，效忠目标重定向···

English: "Nyto"—Paradeus' cornerstone. From today, I am your tool too.
Chinese: “涅托”，帕拉蒂斯的基石，从今天开始也是你的工具了。

English:
Alina's non-Follow-up attacks grant targets 1 stack of [White Mark]. 
When attacked by units with [White Mark], reduces damage taken by 10% per stack and counterattacks with 30% ATK.

At Lv3, gain [Targeted Analysis Contract] to replace one exclusive skill.
At Lv5, gain a 2nd [Targeted Analysis Contract] and equipment [Pale Reaper].
Chinese:
埃莉诺的非追加攻击命中时给予目标1层【白色印记】。
埃莉诺被带有【白色印记】的单位攻击时，每层【白色印记】使受到的伤害减少10%并对攻击者以30%攻击力进行反击。

3级时获得道具【定向解析契约】，使用后可替换1个专属技能。
5级时获得第2张【定向解析契约】与装备【苍白收割者】。

English:
A Paradeus "Nyto" unit wielding a scythe. Descends like a pale reaper, severing steel and harvesting lives. As an elite prototype, she reserves kindness only for those she acknowledges.

If only Adeline or Alina is in the party, the other will prioritize appearing during camp recruitment.
Chinese:
帕拉蒂斯“涅托”里的一员，使用镰刀型的近战武器，如同纯白的死神般降临战场，斩断钢铁、收割生命。作为初期的高级涅托拥有自己的骄傲，只对认可的人露出温柔可爱的一面。

队伍中有且仅有艾德琳与埃莉诺其中之一时，另一方将优先在营地招募时出现。

English: T_aln_7_1: No need for gentleness. Pain doesn't frighten me.
Chinese: T_aln_7_1:不用这么温柔仔细，我不怕疼。

English: T_aln_1_1: Can we hurry? I'm getting bored.
Chinese: T_aln_1_1:速度可以快一点吗？我都快睡着了。

English: T_aln_5_1: Let the dead rot and the living pray.
T_aln_2_1: If this pain could end here...
Chinese: T_aln_2_1:若痛苦可以在这里结束的话···

English: T_aln_4_1: Let's ring the funeral bells for these lost souls.
Chinese: T_aln_4_1:走吧，去给那些迷路的家伙敲响引路的丧钟。
T_aln_9_1:拼拼凑凑的强化，结果居然还不错呢。

English: T_aln_11_1: Overwriting core commands. Loyalty target redirected...
Chinese: T_aln_11_1:底层命令改写，效忠目标重定向···

English: T_aln_11_2: Overwriting core commands. Loyalty target redirected...
Chinese: T_aln_11_2:底层命令改写，效忠目标重定向···

English: Forget an exclusive skill, then select a new one from all exclusive skills.
Chinese: 遗忘一个专属技能，然后从所有专属技能中选择一个学习。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 遺忘一個專屬技能，然後從所有專屬技能中選擇一個學習。

English:
When applying [Black Mark], increases ATK based on target's current stacks percentage for 2 turns.
<color=red>Adeline exclusive</color>
Chinese:
施加【黑色印记】时，根据目标此前的【黑色印记】层数按百分比提升攻击力，持续2回合。
<color=red>仅限艾德琳佩戴</color>

English:
On enemy death, increases ATK/DEF/Evasion by 5% for 3 turns. Gains +5% per [White Mark] stack on the slain enemy.
<color=red>Alina exclusive</color>
Chinese:
敌人死亡时，提升自身攻击力&防御力&闪避率5%，持续3回合。死亡的敌人每带有1层【白色印记】，额外提升5%。
<color=red>仅限埃莉诺佩戴</color>

English: Grants allies Shield equal to damage dealt.
Chinese: 根据造成的伤害，给与友军等值的保护罩。

English:
Prioritize drawing 1 target's skill. 
If enemies with [Black Mark] exist, restore Mana equal to the lowest stack count among them. 
Otherwise, draw 1 more skill.
Chinese:
优先抽取1个目标的技能。
若存在带有【黑色印记】的敌人，根据其中所带层数最低的敌人所带的层数恢复法力值，否则再抽取1个技能。

English:
Generates [Suppression Lock] in hand after use (Excluded, discarded after 1 turn). 
Generated skills can only target previous targets.
Chinese:
使用后在手中生成【定点压制】，附带放逐与1回合后弃牌。
生成的技能只能指定先前指定过的目标。

English: Deals 50% (&a) of damage taken by target during countdown.
Chinese: 额外造成倒计时期间目标受到的伤害的50%(&a)。

English: Damage increases by 12% per stack of [Black Mark] or [White Mark] on target's allies.
Chinese: 目标的所有友军每有1层【黑色印记】或【白色印记】，伤害提升12%。

English:
Deals 5% of target's missing HP per [Black Mark] stack. 
Deals 5% of target's current HP per [White Mark] stack (max &a).
Chinese:
目标每有1层【黑色印记】，额外造成目标5%已损失生命值的伤害。
目标每有1层【白色印记】，额外造成目标5%当前生命值的伤害(至多&a点)。

English:
Attacks target 3 times. 
Countdown extends per skill cost used by allies (non-Exclude skills count as 1). 
Damage increases by 12.5% of previous hit per countdown elapsed.
Chinese:
攻击目标共3次。
倒计时期间，友军每次使用技能都会根据费用延长此技能的倒计时。(非放逐技能至少视为1)
此技能在倒计时栏每经过1倒计时，重复攻击时的伤害都会增加前一次攻击造成伤害的12.5%。

English:
Draw 1 target's skill. 
Does not increase Overload when targeting self.
Chinese:
抽1个目标的技能。
指向自身时不会增加过载。

English:
Draw 2 skills. If all enemies have [White Mark], draw +1. 
Otherwise, apply 1 [White Mark] to all enemies.
Chinese:
抽取2个技能。
若所有敌人都带有【白色印记】则多抽取1个技能，否则给与所有敌人1层【白色印记】。

English:
Generates [Killing Intent] in hand after use (Excluded, discarded after 1 turn). 
Generated skills cannot target previous targets.
Chinese:
使用后在手中生成【杀意弥散】，附带放逐与1回合后弃牌。
生成的技能无法指定先前指定过的目标。

English: When used on Taunted enemies, grants +1 [Enraged!!] stack.
Chinese: 对嘲讽状态的敌人使用时，额外赋予1层【发怒！！】。

English: Grants &b Shield per stack of [Black Mark] or [White Mark] on target.
Chinese: 命中时目标每有1层【黑色印记】或【白色印记】，额外获得&b点保护罩。

English:
Damage increases by 20% per [White Mark] stack. 
If total [Black Mark] stacks ≥ enemy count, cost -1 and gain Swiftness. 
On kill, add copy to hand (Excluded, cost -1).
Chinese:
目标每有1层【白色印记】，造成的伤害提升20%。
所有敌人的【黑色印记】层数总和不低于敌人数量时，费用减少1点并获得迅速。
此技能击杀敌人时，将此技能的复制加入手牌，附带放逐且费用减1。

English:
Gains &a Shield when entering countdown. 
Protects allies during countdown. 
If Shield breaks, activates immediately. 
Each elapsed countdown increases damage by 5% and Critical Rate by 10%. 
At ≥8 countdowns, applies 1 [Enraged!!] to all targets.
Chinese:
进入倒计时栏时获得&a点保护罩。
倒计时期间保护其他友军。
倒计时期间若自身没有保护罩则立即释放，释放时根据在倒计时栏经过的倒计时强化技能效果：
每经过1倒计时，伤害提升5%，暴击率提升10%。
经过的倒计时不小于8时，对所有目标施加1层【发怒！！】。

English: Allies become immune to damage during countdown.
Chinese: 倒计时期间友军免疫伤害。

English:
Removes all [Black Mark] from target's allies and applies equal stacks to target. 
Excess stacks restore Mana (up to this skill's cost).
Chinese:
解除目标的所有友军的【黑色印记】，对目标施加相同层数的【黑色印记】。
此效果施加的【黑色印记】超过上限时，根据超出的层数恢复法力值(不超过此技能使用时的费用)。

English: Applies [White Mark] to target's allies until their stacks match the target's.
Chinese: 对目标所有其他友军施加【白色印记】直至层数不低于目标。
